subSections.title: Etymology 1
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|すそ}}

# the [[bottom]] [[edge]] of a piece of [[clothing]]
# more specifically, the [[hem]] of a piece of [[clothing]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=すそ|historical}} an additional piece of [[fabric]] added along the [[bottom]] [[edge]] of [[formal]] [[robe]]s
# [[foothill]], the [[edge]] of a [[mountain]]
# the [[downstream]] area of a [[river]]
# the [[bottom]] [[edge]] or [[end]] of something, such as one's hair or a [[bounded]] [[region]] on a [[go#English-game|go]] [[board]]
# the [[lower]] [[leg]]s and [[feet]] of a person's [[body]]

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|きょ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=きょ|historical}} in the [[formal wear]] of [[court]] [[noble]]s, the [[end]] portion of an ''[[obi]]'' [[sash]] that is pulled through the [[knot]] and left hanging in back
